name: Bouncing Soul
description:
This game is an arcade little game for ScoreSpace game jam. Good game to play if you are bored and don't have anything else to do. I found myself many times playing this game for hours instead of developing it in this jam, that's why it aint that impressive, but I think it is a cool game.

Controls:
Use W to jump, S to fall faster. Shift to use ability.

Made by me and https://victorccj.itch.io/

Join our Discord community: https://discord.gg/XbAFZ8nfRp
